title: Daydream Watch Face
description: Daydream watch face is a modern look at a classical watch style. Marble white with some bits of pure black perfectly fit each other and create a traditional connection.Watch face features include:    - a separate seconds clock face allows longer hour and minute hand    - a separate weekday clock face    - a date window    - classical style with roman numbers
descriptionHTML:
Daydream watch face is a modern look at a classical watch style. Marble white with some bits of pure black perfectly fit each other and create a traditional connection.
Watch face features include:
- a separate seconds clock face allows longer hour and minute hand
- a separate weekday clock face
- a date window
- classical style with roman numbers
